text: I went there today and bought cake slices and cupcakes and cake pops. They were delicious and loved by all my guests and the pricing is really reasonable.. I'll definitely be going back

I just went yesterday and bought cake pops and cheese cakes, and I'm in love. Not only is the woman there super sweet and so pleasant to talk to, but the cheese cake is so good. Cake pops are great as well, I will return for sure!
Staff is always friendly and cheese cakes and strawberry shortcakes are the best. I brought them to work and everybody loved them.
